document.docAuthor: Mauffray, William F. & Tennessen, Kenneth J.
document.masterDocTitle: A Catalogue and Historical Study of the Odonata of Ecuador

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A Catalogue and Historical Study of the Odonata of Ecuador

subSubSection.paragraph:
Aeschna amazilii
Burmiester, 1839. See
Anax amazili (Burmiester, 1839)
.

Aeschna cyanifrons Hagen, 1861
( nomen nudum ). Synonym of
Coryphaeschna adnexa (Hagen, 1861)
.

Aeschna excisa Brauer, 1865
. Synonym of
Remartina
luteipennis (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Aeschna florida
Hagen, 1861. Synonym of
Remartina
luteipennis (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Aeschna gigas Rambur, 1842
. Synonym of
Staurophlebia reticulata (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Aeschna luteipennis Burmeister, 1839
. See
Remartina
luteipennis (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Aeschna obscuripennis Blanchard, 1845
. See
Triacanthagyna obscuripennis (Blanchard, 1845)
.

Aeschna reticulata Burmeister, 1839
. See
Staurophlebia reticulata (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Aeshna absoluta Calvert, 1952
. See
Rhionaeschna absoluta (Calvert, 1952)
.

Aeshna adnexa Hagen, 1861
. See
Coryphaeschna adnexa (Hagen, 1861)
.

Aeshna biliosa (Kennedy, 1938)
. See
Rhionaeschna biliosa (Kennedy, 1938)
.

Aeshna (Marmaraeschna) brevivercia
Muzón & von Ellenrieder, 2001. See
Rhionaeschna brevicercia
(Muzón & von Ellenrie- der, 2001).

Aeshna brevifrons Hagen, 1861
. Records from Ecuador should be
Rhionaeschna brevicercia
according to Muzón & von Ellenrieder (2001).

Aeshna cornigera Brauer, 1865
. See
Rhionaeschna cornigera (Brauer, 1865)
.

Aeshna cornigera
planaltica Calvert, 1952
. Synonym of
Rhionaeschna planaltica (Calvert, 1952)
.

Aeshna costalis Burmeister, 1839
. See
Neuraeschna costalis (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Aeshna dominicana Hagen, 1861
( nomen nudum ). Probable synonym of
Rhionaeschna psilus (Calvert, 1947)
.

Aeshna elsia Calvert, 1952
. See
Rhionaeschna elsia (Calvert, 1905)
.

Aeshna galapagoensis Currie, 1901
. See
Rhionaeschna galapagoensis (Currie, 1901)
.

Aeshna gracilis Burmeister, 1839
. See
Gynacantha gracilis (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Aeshna joannisi Martin, 1897
. See
Rhionaeschna joannisi (Martin, 1897)
.

Aeshna intricata Martin, 1908
. See
Rhionaeschna intricata (Martin, 1908)
.

Aeshna luteipennis peninsularis
Calvert, 1941. Synonym of
Remartinia luteipennis (Calvert, 1941)
.

Aeshna macromia Brauer, 1865
. Synonym of
Coryphaeschna adnexa (Hagen, 1861)
.

Aeshna marchali Rambur, 1842
. See
Rhionaeschna marchali (Rambur, 1842)
.

Aeshna peralta Ris, 1918
. See discussion under
Rhinoaeschna
peralta (Ris, 1918)
in this appendix.

Aeshna psilus Calvert, 1947
. See
Rhionaeschna psilus (Calvert, 1947)
.

Aeshna rufipennis Kennedy, 1941
. See
Remartina
rufipennis (Kennedy, 1941)
.

Aeshna variegata Fabricius, 1775
. See discussion under
Rhinoaeschna
variegata (Fabricius, 1775)
.

Aeshna virens Rambur, 1842
. Synonym of
Coryphaeschna viriditas Calvert, 1952
.

Aeshna williamsoniana Calvert, 1905
. Publ. Recs. NA : Daigle (1996), mistaken identity for
Remartina
rufipennis (Kennedy, 1941)
, Daigle (pers. comm., 2011).

Anax longipes
concolor (Brauer, 1865)
. See
Anax concolor Brauer, 1865
.

Anax maculatus Rambur, 1842
. Synonym of
Anax amazili (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Coryphaeschna guyanensis Machet, 1991
. Synonym of
Coryphaeschna adnexa (Hagen, 1861)
.

Coryphaeschna luteipennis (Burmeister, 1839)
. See
Remartina
luteipennis (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Coryphaeschna perrensi (McLachlan, 1887)
. Publ. Recs. ECU: (H14). Also ARG, BRA, PRY, URY: (H06), (P11); plus CEN, PER, VEN: (H06). Before
Coryphaeschna diapyra
and
C. huaorania
were described, specimens from Ecuador may have keyed out to this species. It is doubtful that this southern South American species occurs in Ecuador .

Coryphaeschna rufipennis (Kennedy, 1941)
. See
Remartina
rufipennis (Kennedy, 1941)
.

Coryphaeschna virens (Rambur, 1842)
. Synonym of
Coryphaeschna viriditas Calvert, 1952
.

Gynacantha ferox Erichson, 1848
. Synonym of
Neuraeschna costalis (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Gynacantha flavistyla
? Publ. Recs. GY: Campos (1922). Other than being listed by Campos, we could not find any reference to this name; possibly it was a nomen nudum .

Gynacantha jubilaris Navás, 1915
. Synonym of
Gynacantha membranalis Karsch 1891
.

Gynacantha obscuripennis (Blanchard, 1845)
. See
Triacanthagyna obscuripennis (Blanchard, 1847)
.

Gynacantha satyrus Martin, 1909
. See
Triacanthagyna satyrus (Martin, 1909)
.

Gynacantha septima Selys in Sagra, 1857
. See
Triacanthagyna septima (Selys in Sagra, 1857)
.

Gynacantha trifida Rambur, 1842
. See
Triacanthagyna trifida (Rambur, 1842)
.

Gynacantha subviridis sensu Kirby, 1897
. Synonym of
Gynacantha auricularis Martin, 1909
.

Neuraeschna costalis var. hyalinata Belle, 1989
. Synonym of
Neuraeschna costalis (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Neuraeschna costalis var. marginata Belle, 1989
. Synonym of
Neuraeschna costalis (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Neuraeschna inarmata Kimmins, 1951
. Synonym of
Neuraeschna dentigera Martin, 1909
.

Remartinia barbiellina Navás, 1911
. Synonym of
Remartina
luteipennis (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Rhinoaeschna
peralta (Ris, 1918)
. Publ. Recs. ECU : Paulson (1983), Tsuda (1986), Steinmann (1997b); “Balsapampa” (Calvert 1956). Also there are 2 ♀♀ specimens labeled
Aeshna peralta
in QZAC from Quito and Pintag. Von Ellenrieder (2003) discussed the errors in identification of this species and recorded it only from the Andes of southern Peru and Bolivia . It is not included on the list.

Rhinoaeschna
variegata (Fabricius, 1775)
. Publ. Recs. ECU : Tsuda (1991). This reference is prior to the revision of the subgenus
Marmaraeschna
by Muzón & von Ellenrieder (2001). According to von Ellenrieder (2003), this form is found only in Argentina and Chile , therefore it is not included on the list.

Staurophlebia magnifica Brauer, 1865
. Synonym of
Staurophlebia reticulata (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Staurophlebia platyura Navás, 1920
. Probable synonym of
Staurophlebia reticulata (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Staurophlebia reticulata obscura
Walker, 1915. Synonym of
Staurophlebia reticulata (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Staurophlebia reticulata guatemalteca
Walker, 1915. Synonym of
Staurophlebia reticulata (Burmeister, 1839)
.

Triacanthagyna trifida (Rambur, 1842)
. Publ. Recs. CR : (Campos 1922), EO : (Campos 1922, 1927), GY : (Campos 1922). Not listed for Ecuador by Paulson, 1983 or 2009. Williamson (1923a) reported it from southern U.S. and the Greater Antilles, although it is listed from COL: P&P, (2011). It is not listed by (P16) from Ecuador .
